title: Girl critical and man arrested in Co Offaly collision
desc: A teenage girl is in critical condition following an incident involving a car and two pedestrians in Clara, Co Offaly. The girl was treated at the scene has been taken to Crumlin Hospital in Dublin.

title: McKenna Grace on Working With Glenn Close in New Hunger Games Movie
desc: McKenna Grace says it was fun being yelled at by Glenn Close in ‘The Hunger Games: Sunrise on the Reaping.’

title: Brentford coach backs Onyeka for Championship success
desc: Brentford coach Keith Andrews backs Frank Onyeka for success after his loan move to Championship side Coventry City, citing the need for regular game time.

title: Robbie Williams: social media would have 'seen me off' in the 90s
desc: With his new album Britpop breaking a record set by the Beatles, the singer takes a moment to celebrate.

desc: Flamengo open the door to Vinicius Jr.’s return as his contract renewal with Real Madrid remains stalled. Could Vini return to the Maracanã?

title: Trump, Xi discuss Taiwan and soybeans in call aimed at easing China, US relations
